data.title: Stamatis Makris - Men's Basketball 2007-08
data.meta_description: Men's Basketball 2007-08 - Stamatis Makris: The Official Athletic Site of Auburn University, partner of WMT Digital. The most comprehensive coverage of the Auburn Tigers on the web with rosters, schedules, scores, highlights, game recaps and more!
data.text:
2007-08 (Freshman): Walked-on to the team prior to the start of the season.

HIGH SCHOOL AND PERSONAL DATA: Attended Lee-Scott Academy in Auburn as a foreign exchange student in 2006-07 to graduate high school ... attended The Grammar School in Limassol, Cyprus, from 2000-06 ...averaged 17 points, 5 assists, 4 steals, 3 rebounds per game while averaging nearly four 3-pointers made per game as a senior in 2006-07 for coach Steven Kilcrease at Lee-Scott ... named AISA all-state first-team and played in the Bi-City All-Star Classic in Columbus, Ga.... was a member of Cyprus[apos] junior national team, averaging 17 points in 2004-05 while shooting 50 percent from the field and 35 percent from 3-point range ... was coached by Kostas Filippopoulosin at The Grammar School in Limassol ... full name is Stamatis Makris ... born January 2, 1989, in Limassol, Cyprus. ... son of Stavros and Elena Makris and has two brothers, Andreas and Paris.
